JobFullDesc: Blogs Editor, Sr. AdvisorSocial media is the platform for telling the world how our products are driving human progress. Our Social Media team develops, implements and coordinates internal and external social media strategies that promote Dell Technologies’ innovations to investors, potential customers, employees and the public. As well as creating campaigns, it analyzes responses to social media activities to improve our stories and messages, thereby driving traffic and growing revenue.Join us as a Senior Advisor on our Social Business team to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveAs a Blogs Editor, you will be responsible for writing, editing, and finalizing our corporate blog communications.
